showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ rusted out. There is mold in the soap dispenser ceiling is covered in mold and it looks like black mold And there‚Äôs mold in the vents that you can see. The ceiling in the shower is dirty. On side of the toilet is dirty. The stains and ‚Ä¶
Very clean store and they offer truck drivers free shower

‚Ä¶ the trash cans so as not to take up an 18-wheeler space. Nice level lot; was able to stay connected to the truck and kick out the slide to get a quick shower and some rest. Then back on the road again in the morning. Very back of the lot ‚Ä¶

The service was great!! The employees were opening shower rooms (with rest room inside) to help alleviate the long lines for the women‚Äôs restroom. Everyone was polite and very helpful!! The Arby‚Äôs attached did not disappoint either! The ‚Ä¶

They don't knock when entering shower, just walk on in & laugh about it, no I'm sorry, no apology, nothing! Will let all showers go uncleaned & instead of cleaning them all will only do one every 30mins+, if your lucky! For us it was a ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ as loves goes.  Only 1/2  of the fountain machine is working.  Showers are smallish and weren't as clean as they should have been ( found pubs in shower ) Laundry has 2 washers and 4 dryers ($2.50 each credit card,  loves card or quarters) ‚Ä¶

While hanging out doing laundry today I had the displeasure of seeing first hand how this place "cleans" it's showers.  I watched an associate and the manager Kenny wipe the showers down with dry towels making it look like they'd been ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewerName: 4everanomad You only get one life, LOVE TO LIVE it!
showerReviews.reviewText: Very busy friendly service in order to get a free shower 50 gallons of gas is absurd to have to purchase it should be 30 or 35 so that the rvers who use loves a lot can use the services without being discriminated against based upon the ‚Ä¶
showerReviews.uniqueId: 4everanomad You only get one life, LOVE TO LIVE it!_Very_busy_friendly_service_in_order_to_get_a_free__7 years ago

showerReviews.reviewText: Horrible staff. Horrible bathrooms. Bathroom was overflowing so I had to use the shower bathroom and they tried to charge me for a shower. Rude and unprofessional. Unkind staff.

‚Ä¶ The water in the shower was very warm on the clod setting and extremely hot on all other settings,no cold water.it was hot and stuffy in the shower room and did not even have a fan!! The experience was bad all around hope to try and avoid ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ with camping, making sure things all in good working order before we get out of the state.  it's a very clean campground, level sites, full hook up,  shower house very clean & gas station so we fill up before we get back on the road again.

Love the new improvements here at Rocky's - huge level concrete pull through sites with new palm trees and a new shower house. You won't find friendlier and more helpful camp hosts anywhere - owner even came by and helped us solve a ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText:
July 20/25 6 pm.
Rude dismissive staff. Two ladies working and neither can be bothered to even acknowledge customers. When forced to interact they are rude. The facility is very nice however the shower system is not working in the app.

‚Ä¶ very bad management they see there are a lot of people waiting in line and there is only one cashier working, also the showers are too small not even for one person , all of the inside clothes hangers are broken, The walls and the floors ‚Ä¶

Cashiers were very nice! However I was getting a shower and as a female driver when I stop for a restroom break I squat over the seat due to cleanliness. But when I stop to shower I expect to finally be able to sit on the toilet seat after ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ and nothing was done? I just got out my shower and sat in the TV area to cool off since of course there‚Äôs no ventilation. the cleaning guy went into my stall and was there 3 mins when he came out with my towels. Someone went in not too ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ but she went above her job duties to help us. So that was the best part of our visit. Later the night we came to shower, reserved the shower on the app, we got inside and as we got to the shower door our number expired and kicked us out the ‚Ä¶

Shower stall was very clean. Shower  room not quite as good.  Time the mop bucket water was changed, I  think.  A tip: If you mopped behind the door you would  have found  the soiled towel that the driver before  me left hanging  there. Sto ‚Ä¶

If you are looking to take a shower keep driving to the next Pilot, Loves or TA. Barely any water pressure. Bathrooms are covered in mold. This place has been under construction for as long as I can remember but no progress at all. The only ‚Ä¶

This Flying needs better management.  Store and bathrooms not clean. Out of hand paper, toilet our of order, faucet out of order.  Flies flying around food at Subway station. Shower and Dennys were good though.

10/15/2022‚Äì10/16/22 doing a reset here. men‚Äôs room by shower is disgusting toilet stall door won‚Äôt lock door opened up on me by someone twice. Dennys can keep their day crew people. Waitress asked me 3 times what I wanted to order.  (French ‚Ä¶

Just took a shower here and walked past another shower room being cleaned. The cleaner was using a bath towel to wipe down the toilet. I know towels are laundered and all but still...yuk, ew, gross üòù. ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ coming home puts a lot on our shoulders Etc. So when the propane ran out I said why not and went into town to use my driver shower credits that I have paid for by being a loyal customer. I was literally utterly taken aback at how rudely I ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ van. But a guy named Justin gave me just one hour at the stand and I explained to him that we were taking a shower and snacks and we had nowhere to go because we were evacuating from Hurricane Milton and that he should put his hand on his ‚Ä¶

I love visiting Pilot around the country. This one is no exception. This is a beautiful truck stop with just about everything you'd need. The prices are fair, the food it's good, and there was no wait for a shower! üòäüòäüëçüíû ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ awesome. Met cool people working. Everybody up in that pilot has great customer service skills. Will always stop by to shower and sit down to eat inside. Great food, great environment. Everyone else can try going there to eat subway etc...

Stopped at this pilot location and paid for a shower, after waiting for about an hour, I started noticing that I hadn't seen an employee going into the shower area to clean and release showers... When I went up front to confront an employee ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ Good shower and laundry facilities,  as well as parking. ‚Ä¶
Very clean Truckstop... courteous staff. Stop to take a shower. Shower was very clean. Nice tv room, game room, and laindry room. AAAA++++

‚Ä¶ be a fresh store , the food on the other hand not so much ended up getting sick halfway thru the night , the shower had good pressure but not the cleanest , same could be said for parking , also the police could be seen patrolling the lot

‚Ä¶ Shower pressure was well, not the cleanest conditions though, wouldn‚Äôt spend too much time in there. Manager was friendly, as well as front desk staff. Shower attendant, you clearly missed a spot .

‚Ä¶ . The inside leaves less to be desired, many shelves in the cooler were empty, coffe station not fill and the fountain are a disaster of ice, spills and trash. The shower needed to be sweep and needs new towels and better water pressure.

showerReviews.reviewText: The employees were the sweetest!! And it‚Äôs very clean and good food. But I actually have a story. I was getting food at the McDonalds nearby and my AirPods fell out of my car. I didn‚Äôt realize it until I was 45 minutes out from the place ‚Ä¶
Extremely clean! Nice employees. However, the cooks in McDonald's must have been related. They argued constantly.

The staff was help amazing customer service. Great products. Thanks so much I have several leg and foot cramps and body cramps from time time my husband was looking at a product that the staff was very helpful. As well as great priced. Clean store!!
showerReviews.uniqueId: Tonja Tonee Tafoya Davis Smith_The_staff_was_help_amazing_customer_service._Great_3 years ago

showerReviews.reviewText: Just left this place.  Womens restroom was disgusting.  One stall was out of order, one had urine all over the floor, no toilet paper or even seat covers and the handicap stall....clearly the previous woman had some female issues.  Was ‚Ä¶

When I stopped to get a quick bite, I found the McD was only open for drive thru which illiminated the chance of using the restroom. The store next door had one option with a line. The lunch I had was terrible not up to McD's regular standards and was closed even though there was no state order to do so.

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ the entire time. The wife reported no TP in her restroom either. Worst TA, I've seen in some time. I remember someone checking and keeping the restrooms clean. I just hope the drivers shower room and floors are clean. But I'd doubt that.

‚Ä¶ locked up needed emergency repair. The staff was extremely hard working and diligent even a team member traveled 160 miles to get the truck part we needed. We were given a free shower. Was really a good experience super professional staff

‚Ä¶ sure why it‚Äôs so many bad reviews when they‚Äôre so genuine, and nice here. The house politely here is amazing makes you feel like you‚Äôre at home, and after the shower.. They‚Äôve a movie area, and a book shelf where you can take a book or ‚Ä¶
As a female truck driver I would not recommend stopping here to do a reset. I've been here for 24 hours and they have yet to clean the restroom.  I didn't dare ask for a shower.
All good in my book.  Clean shower and friendly staff.

Shower was dirty. I've definitely been at better facilities. I mean if the cleaning people done anything the towels wouldnt smell like piss and there wouldn't still be hair from the last person all over the place. If I could I'd give this ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ Pay for a shower (I guess my repair bill wasn't enough to qualify). ‚Ä¶
This location is really nice  loved it,  I was looking for a shower I hadn‚Äôt with me my TA rewards card but they gave me a free shower they‚Äôre really nice service!!!!

‚Ä¶ hot food if you need sodas something breaks down anything like that to keep a supply of clothing all kinds of things you need on the road to travel showers if you need to shower if you're on the road for a long time I give this t a 5 stars.

shower experience was not the best after I left my shower the guy came in picked up the towels brought in new towels did not spray anything down or did not wipe anything just shut the door and called it good

showerReviews.reviewText: If you're a trucker And you want to shower go to the next stop. The bathroom / /shower was absolutely disgusting and the water only got lukewarm at best. When I brought the key back the guy said towels? Like I was obligated to bring them ‚Ä¶
Really nice people and super good food! A little run down but can't beat good food and a hot shower. Parking was ok. If there is Parking it's really easy. Huge lot

Don‚Äôt know what all the bad reviews are about. Yes the place is old. It is cleaner than some of the big box stops. Shower was clean. People were very friendly. Had breakfast and lunch and the food was great. Do a little update and get ‚Ä¶
Needed a shower after a Red Eye flight from Phoenix AZ to ATL. The price was right, BUT the showers are really run down not the cleanest. $10 verses $16 at Loves, should've stopped at Loves
Best shower ever!!!! Better water pressure then most Pilots and Love‚Äôs ! Good food overall great stop!!!
Maybe looks not perfect but there is realy hot water in the shower

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ and was good had plenty of vegetables and meat to choose from. The parking here was good all night then went and got a shower it was 10 dollars if you don't get 50 gallon of fuel the showers are not huge but plenty of room and also they ‚Ä¶

Shower was hot. Floor was nasty, no trash can( trash was everywhere), no towels, no hooks, no soap, and charged the same as a loves. Bathroom has every little toilet paper and not enough when you have to share with the person next to you.
Shower wasn't much to brag about. ‚Ä¶
I would rather they shut the shower down. They charge $10 to shower in a jail cell! No towels..just take your money damn if you shower damn if you don‚Äôt!
Lady at the front desk was nice and friendly. Though the showers were some of the nastiest showers I ever been in. I would not shower here again.
Lots of parking. Showers $10, but very dirty, and mold or mildew on the shower curtain. Sorry, but could be washed.
Restrooms very dirty if the showers are as dirty as the restroom would not shower there.

showerReviews.reviewText: Nice quiet place to stop for your ten hr break for a truck driver. Shower not clean. New owner closed the restaurant down no place to seat and eat, no waitresses. Food choice is snacks and a small limited menu from a fryer. Chicken tenders ‚Ä¶

Very sad how it has changed since NEW OWNERS. Way down hill. Lots of stuff in the store. Very filthy shower! Gigantic holes in the parking lot. Just another example of good little truck stop take over. Very sad to see!
Restaurant here is very good. Plenty of parking. If you come for a shower bring your own towel. Cozy little drivers lounge as well.
Real home cooking. Worth the money. Showers are not all that great. Anyone that gets the code for the lounge area can take a shower.

Clean shower
Big sofa to watch the game
Water hose to rinse off windows in fuel island
